summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3689 for the improvement of Dawson Street, from Bowen Place, to 46th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45455, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
